title: Wassup's Nada is being influenced by famous hip-hopper 'A'? | allkpop.com
text: Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Wassup's Nada is being influenced by famous hip-hopper 'A'? By jennywill 5 minutes ago 953 56 0 0 Google+ It's come to light that Wassup 's Nada may be being influenced by famous hiphopper 'A' in her lawsuit. ' Sports Seoul ' discovered that this 'A' was supporting Nada in various ways. If the relationship goes beyond just a mentor, the situation could turn bad, especially for her lawsuit. An insider told Sports Seoul, " While Nada has her lawsuit with her label Mafia Records , she's considering 'A' to be her closest ally and is depending on 'A' for everything. It's a well-known secret in the hiphop scene that the two have been friends for a while. " Both Nada and 'A' are staying in USA currently. SEE ALSO: [MVP OP-ED] - The death of a K-Pop generation 'A' is a famous hip hopper who leads a hip hop label. On the 28th, Nada had a solo club performance after her lawsuit, and it's now turned out that 'A' was also related to the club. An insider friend to 'A' said, " Recently, 'A' asked their closer friends what they thought about Nada coming to their label. It seems like 'A' does not know how the music scene works. Many who do know the music scene well advised that 'A' does not bring Nada to their label. " Who do you think 'A' could be?
